Html:
Hi,

I'm an arcane mage and my current DPS with AB3ABar3MBAM is 3585.29. (Buff: Arcane Intellect, Flask of Frost Wyrm and Molten Armor)

I changed my main hand weapon from "Life and Death" to "Spectral Kris" with 12 SP and 10 Spirit gem. 

The problem is my DPS decreased too much. (3585.29 -> 3469.86)

 

Stat change

-6 Crit Rating

+17 Haste

-14 Intellect

+38 Spell Power (with gem)

+10 Spirit (gem)

 

I think it shouldn't be changing too much like this. Any idea why this happened?

Thank you.
Everyone, if you want us to explain why you see some results, you always should post your character file.
Which also means that this should be located in the Issues Tracker, not Discussions.
